sentences: Carli Tornehave (born 26 August 1932, in Stockholm), is a Swedish singer and actor.
He has participated at Melodifestivalen six times; in 1962 he performed Anneli and När min vän, in 1963 he performed Twist till menuett and En gång i Stockholm.
The song "En gång i Stockholm" won the contest, but Monica Zetterlund was appointed to represent Sweden in the Eurovision Song Contest in London.
In 1966, he performed Monte Carlo and Härliga söndag ending on third and 8th place.
Hård stad (Rough Road by Lee Hazlewood) – 1961
När min vän kommer tillbaka (with Monica Zetterlund)
